item.title: Lemmy Server
item.description: /c/Lemmy Server on prime8s.xyz https://prime8s.xyz/c/lemmyadmin Description Welcome to [!lemmyadmin@prime8s.xyz](https://prime8s.xyz/c/lemmyadmin), where we discuss various aspects of administering lemmy instances. Challenges, tips, tricks, and other insights on Lemmy Administration. 1. No hate speech, flaming, or harassment. 2. No pornography 3. Please keep criticism constructive and helpful, remember the human!
